     * @throws ReflectionException

        // Table Data ...
        {seeder}


        // Cleaning up the table before seeding ...
        $this->db->table('{table}')->truncate();

        //Using Query Builder Class ...
        try {
        $this->db->table('{table}')->insertBatch(${table});

            throw new ReflectionException($e->getMessage());
        }
    }
}
